key.name: dark-mode
key.summary: Sets the preferred application theme settings
key.description: true means that every application will use the dark theme. false means that every application will use the light theme

key.name: enable-gtk-theme
key.summary: Whether or not to switch the GTK theme between dark and light
key.description: If enabled, the GTK theme will be switched when toggled between light and dark mode

key.name: enable-dark-desktop
key.summary: Prefer dark application themes. Sets the global dark setting
key.description: Prefer dark application themes. Sets the global dark

key.name: enable-vscode-theme
key.summary: Whether or not to switch the vscode theme between dark and light
key.description: If enabled, the VSCode editor theme will be switched when toggled between light and dark mode
